toc.name: Types of software
toc.description: Get an overview of the most common types of cryptocurrency and blockchain software categories.

toc.name: Wallets
toc.description: Find out what functionality is typically found in cryptocurrency wallets and how it's structured.

toc.name: User onboarding
toc.description: User onboarding is the process of increasing the likelihood that new users become successful when adopting your product.

toc.name: First use
toc.description: Learn how cryptocurrency wallets typically introduce users to their functionality.

toc.name: Creating a wallet
toc.description: An overview of how wallets are created and how the steps can be presented to users.

toc.name: Sending
toc.description: Learn about best practices and common patterns for designing cryptocurrency transactions.

toc.name: Requesting
toc.description: Best practices for designing cryptocurrency request interfaces.

toc.name: Transactions
toc.description: Transactions are at the heart of blockchain and so they are typically shown right on the home screen of any wallet. Users quickly want to see if a transaction they made was processed and if any new new ones have come in.

toc.name: Addresses
toc.description: Find out how to design addresses and address management interfaces for cryptocurrencies.

toc.name: Home screens
toc.description: Examples and best practices of home screen designs for cryptocurrency software.
